83A10010 83C1000C
83E10008 80010020
7C0803A6 3821001C

Attempts to teleport the kart to the next checkpoint coordinates.
If there are multiple paths, character will teleport to a random one.

Online [O]
Offline [O]

- This only applies to the player with a Wii U Gamepad.
- This code is fully stable.

<Left Stick Button>
Enable

---

Source: https://github.com/Mewtality/TCPGecko-MK8-Cheat-Codes

Is Raw Machine Code [O]
Is Assembly RAM Writes [X]

---

Recommended to be used with:
- Disable Boundaries [Mewtality]
- Disable Culling [Mewtality]
